Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the referral of certain elevator-related violations  to the department of housing preservation and development  for consideration under the emergency repair program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Referral of certain elevator-related violations  to the dept of HPD for consideration under the emergency repair program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the referral of certain elevator-related violations  to the department of housing preservation and development  for consideration under the emergency repair program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Referral of certain elevator-related violations  to the dept of HPD for consideration under the emergency repair program.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Vacca and Johnson
